needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text:
I was an unhappy 9-year-old when I started writing essays, and I still find it a painful experience.  A lot of people don't have to think much about what they want to do, but I did.  And when I didn't know what I wanted to do, I knew that I should figure it out.[1] <PAUSE>  The idea that there's a way to discover your true nature, no matter how well you're taught to be good or how smart you are, is a central element of many religions.  If you really want to make a good marriage, you have to find someone who shares your values; the idea is that no one who doesn't share your values will make you happy.  The value of marriage is partly because marriage is in itself a valuable institution, and partly because it gives us the opportunity to make more marriages that we'd otherwise be too scared to try.Angry parents or relatives might tell you to "just find what you
like and do that."  They may have done this, when they had kids of their own.  But when you're the one who's supposed to be
making the decision, the parent might say "you're always so
disagreeable, you'll never find anything."Or the parent might say "you're so good at this,
you'll be fine."  Or they might tell you "you're so smart,
you don't even need to go to school anymore."This is called internal motivation.  But what if your parents don't
recognise anything you do, and never have?  The American philosopher
John Dewey had a response to that.  He called them external
motivation.  His idea was that if there's no good reason to do
something, then you shouldn't do it even if you're internally
motivated; and on the other hand, if there's no good reason to do
something, you shouldn't do it even if you're externally
motivated.  But if there is a good reason, then both the
internal and external reasons should encourage you to do it (or
not).  What motivates me to write?  That's a fair question.[2] <PAUSE>  What motivates you to start a startup?  What motivates you
to be a good programmer?  What motivates you to be a good
philosopher?  One way to answer that
